AlfaRomeo.name: Alfa Romeo
AlfaRomeo.description: Italian manufacturer known for stylish design and sporty handling. Rich racing heritage combined with passionate engineering and distinctive Italian character.

Alpine.name: Alpine
Alpine.description: French sports car manufacturer focused on lightweight performance. Famous for rally success and creating driver-focused, agile vehicles with racing DNA.

AstonMartin.name: Aston Martin
AstonMartin.description: British luxury sports car manufacturer synonymous with James Bond. Combines elegant design, handcrafted luxury, and exhilarating performance in grand touring excellence.

Audi.name: Audi
Audi.description: German premium automaker pioneering Quattro all-wheel drive technology. Blends sophisticated design, cutting-edge technology, and refined performance across diverse lineup.

Bentley.name: Bentley
Bentley.description: British ultra-luxury car manufacturer crafting handmade masterpieces. Combines opulent interiors, powerful performance, and timeless elegance for discerning customers.

BMW.name: BMW
BMW.description: Bavarian Motor Works creates driver-focused premium vehicles. Known for exceptional handling dynamics, powerful engines, and the iconic kidney grille design.

Bugatti.name: Bugatti
Bugatti.description: French manufacturer of ultra-exclusive hypercars. Engineering marvels combining unmatched speed, luxury craftsmanship, and artistic design in limited production masterpieces.

Buick.name: Buick
Buick.description: American premium brand offering refined comfort and quiet luxury. Focuses on sophisticated design, advanced technology, and smooth, comfortable driving experience.

BYD.name: BYD
BYD.description: Chinese EV and battery technology leader. Pioneers affordable electric mobility with innovative blade battery technology and comprehensive electrified vehicle range.

Cadillac.name: Cadillac
Cadillac.description: American luxury brand representing bold design and innovation. Combines athletic performance, advanced technology, and distinctive styling in premium segment.

Chevrolet.name: Chevrolet
Chevrolet.description: Iconic American brand offering diverse vehicle lineup. From legendary Corvette to reliable trucks, delivers accessible performance and innovative features for everyone.

Chrysler.name: Chrysler
Chrysler.description: American brand focusing on comfort and innovation. Pioneer of minivan segment, offering family-friendly vehicles with upscale features and refined driving dynamics.

Citroen.name: CitroÃ«n
Citroen.description: French manufacturer known for innovative technology and comfort. Famous for hydropneumatic suspension and quirky, distinctive designs that challenge automotive conventions.

Cupra.name: Cupra
Cupra.description: Spanish performance brand spun from SEAT. Delivers sporty, electrified vehicles with bold design, racing heritage, and Mediterranean passion for driving excitement.

Czinger.name: Czinger
Czinger.description: American hypercar manufacturer using 3D-printed components. Revolutionary approach combining hybrid technology, advanced manufacturing, and extreme performance engineering.

Dacia.name: Dacia
Dacia.description: Romanian brand offering exceptional value. Part of Renault Group, provides practical, reliable, and affordable vehicles with no-nonsense approach to mobility.

DeTomaso.name: De Tomaso
DeTomaso.description: Italian sports car maker famous for Pantera. Legendary for combining Italian styling with American V8 power in affordable exotic package.

Dodge.name: Dodge
Dodge.description: American muscle car icon producing high-horsepower vehicles. Known for Challenger, Charger, and raw V8 power delivering straight-line performance and aggressive attitude.

DS.name: DS Automobiles
DS.description: French premium brand from CitroÃ«n heritage. Offers avant-garde design, refined luxury, and innovative technology with distinctive French elegance and craftsmanship.

FaradayFuture.name: Faraday Future
FaradayFuture.description: American EV startup focused on intelligent luxury mobility. Developing connected, autonomous, and electric vehicles with futuristic technology and user experience.

Ferrari.name: Ferrari
Ferrari.description: Italian luxury sports car manufacturer representing automotive excellence. Founded by Enzo Ferrari, combines racing heritage, iconic red color, and unmatched performance passion.

Fiat.name: Fiat
Fiat.description: Italian manufacturer famous for compact, stylish city cars. Pioneer of affordable mobility with charming design, efficient engines, and Italian flair for urban driving.

Ford.name: Ford
Ford.description: American automotive pioneer revolutionizing mass production. Legendary F-Series trucks, Mustang performance, and diverse lineup serving millions with reliable transportation.

Genesis.name: Genesis
Genesis.description: Korean luxury brand from Hyundai Motor Group. Offers sophisticated design, cutting-edge technology, and exceptional value in premium segment with athletic elegance.

GMC.name: GMC
GMC.description: American truck and SUV specialist emphasizing capability. Delivers rugged utility, premium features, and professional-grade performance for work and family needs.

Hennessey.name: Hennessey
Hennessey.description: American performance specialist creating extreme hypercars. World-renowned for record-breaking speed, outrageous horsepower, and pushing boundaries of automotive performance.

Honda.name: Honda
Honda.description: Japanese manufacturer legendary for reliability and engineering. VTEC technology, Civic and Accord icons, delivering efficient, dependable transportation with sporty character.

Hyundai.name: Hyundai
Hyundai.description: Korean manufacturer offering exceptional value and warranty. Rapidly advancing design, technology, and electrification with comprehensive lineup for every need.

Jaguar.name: Jaguar
Jaguar.description: British luxury brand combining elegance with performance. Distinctive design, refined interiors, and sporty dynamics create sophisticated driving experience with heritage.

Jeep.name: Jeep
Jeep.description: American off-road icon born from military heritage. Legendary Wrangler capability, adventure spirit, and go-anywhere attitude define authentic 4x4 experience.

Kia.name: Kia
Kia.description: Korean brand transforming with bold design and technology. Industry-leading warranty, value pricing, and increasingly sophisticated vehicles challenge premium competitors.

Koenigsegg.name: Koenigsegg
Koenigsegg.description: Swedish hypercar manufacturer pushing technological boundaries. Innovative engineering, record-breaking performance, and exclusive production create automotive masterpieces.

Lamborghini.name: Lamborghini
Lamborghini.description: Italian supercar maker born from rivalry with Ferrari. Dramatic angular design, thunderous V12 engines, and scissor doors create ultimate automotive drama.

LandRover.name: Land Rover
LandRover.description: British luxury off-road specialist combining capability with refinement. From Defender ruggedness to Range Rover opulence, masters terrain with British sophistication.

Lexus.name: Lexus
Lexus.description: Toyota's luxury division pioneering hybrid luxury. Exceptional reliability, meticulous craftsmanship, and smooth refinement create serene premium experience.

Lotus.name: Lotus
Lotus.description: British sports car maker championing simplify, then add lightness. Pure driving dynamics, minimalist approach, and handling excellence define driver-focused philosophy.

Lucid.name: Lucid
Lucid.description: American luxury EV manufacturer challenging Tesla. Industry-leading range, exquisite craftsmanship, and advanced technology redefine electric luxury sedan segment.

Maserati.name: Maserati
Maserati.description: Italian luxury sports car maker with racing heritage. Distinctive exhaust note, elegant design, and passionate engineering create exclusive grand touring experience.

Mazda.name: Mazda
Mazda.description: Japanese manufacturer prioritizing driving pleasure. Rotary engine heritage, lightweight MX-5 icon, and Kodo design create engaging, driver-focused vehicles.

McLaren.name: McLaren
McLaren.description: British supercar maker applying Formula 1 technology. Carbon fiber expertise, precision engineering, and aerodynamic excellence create race-bred road cars.

Mercedes.name: Mercedes-Benz
Mercedes.description: German luxury pioneer inventing the automobile. Three-pointed star represents prestige, innovation, and engineering excellence across comprehensive luxury lineup.

MG.name: MG
MG.description: British sports car heritage now Chinese-owned. Historic roadster legacy combined with modern affordable vehicles, offering accessible driving pleasure.

MINI.name: MINI
MINI.description: British icon reimagined by BMW. Go-kart handling, customizable style, and premium compact package deliver fun, individual mobility with retro charm.

Nissan.name: Nissan
Nissan.description: Japanese manufacturer from sports cars to crossovers. GT-R performance legend, pioneering EVs with Leaf, and reliable transportation across segments.

Opel.name: Opel
Opel.description: German brand offering practical, efficient vehicles. Engineering quality, innovative technology, and value proposition serve European mainstream market effectively.

Pagani.name: Pagani
Pagani.description: Italian hypercar artisan crafting automotive sculptures. Extreme attention to detail, Mercedes-AMG power, and artistic design create exclusive mechanical masterpieces.

Peugeot.name: Peugeot
Peugeot.description: Historic French manufacturer with lion emblem. Combines distinctive design, efficient powertrains, and innovative i-Cockpit for engaging European mobility.

Polestar.name: Polestar
Polestar.description: Swedish electric performance brand from Volvo. Minimalist Scandinavian design, sustainable materials, and engaging electric driving redefine performance vehicles.

Porsche.name: Porsche
Porsche.description: German sports car icon with legendary 911. Combines everyday usability with thrilling performance, precision engineering, and timeless design philosophy.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: American truck brand spun from Dodge. Heavy-duty capability, luxurious interiors, and powerful engines serve demanding work and lifestyle truck needs.

Renault.name: Renault
Renault.description: French manufacturer from economy to Alpine performance. Innovative approach, electric pioneers, and Formula 1 heritage create diverse, accessible lineup.

Rimac.name: Rimac
Rimac.description: Croatian electric hypercar pioneer and technology supplier. Nevera showcases extreme electric performance, advanced battery tech, and innovative engineering excellence.

Rivian.name: Rivian
Rivian.description: American electric adventure vehicle manufacturer. Purpose-built electric trucks and SUVs combine outdoor capability, innovative features, and sustainable mobility.

RollsRoyce.name: Rolls-Royce
RollsRoyce.description: British pinnacle of automotive luxury and craftsmanship. Bespoke creations, supreme comfort, and Spirit of Ecstasy emblem represent ultimate prestige and refinement.

Skoda.name: Å koda
Skoda.description: Czech brand within Volkswagen Group offering smart value. Practical innovations, spacious interiors, and Volkswagen quality create clever, affordable transportation.

Smart.name: Smart
Smart.description: German-Chinese urban mobility specialist. Compact electric vehicles perfect for city parking, combining efficiency, modern tech, and sustainable urban transportation.

SSC.name: SSC North America
SSC.description: American hypercar maker chasing speed records. Extreme performance, aerospace-inspired engineering, and record-breaking achievements define exclusive production vehicles.

Subaru.name: Subaru
Subaru.tagline: Love. It's what makes Subaru a Subaru.
Subaru.description: Japanese manufacturer championing symmetrical all-wheel drive. Boxer engines, rally heritage, and safe, capable vehicles create loyal following for adventure-ready transportation.

Suzuki.name: Suzuki
Suzuki.description: Japanese manufacturer specializing in small, efficient vehicles. Lightweight engineering, motorcycle expertise, and affordable mobility serve global markets effectively.

Tesla.name: Tesla
Tesla.description: American EV pioneer revolutionizing automotive industry. Cutting-edge technology, autonomous driving features, industry-leading range, and over-the-air updates redefine mobility.

Toyota.name: Toyota
Toyota.description: World's largest automaker legendary for reliability. Hybrid pioneer with Prius, diverse lineup, and kaizen philosophy deliver dependable transportation for millions globally.

Volkswagen.name: Volkswagen
Volkswagen.description: German manufacturer meaning people's car. From Beetle heritage to modern Golf, combines quality engineering, practical design, and accessible premium features.

Volvo.name: Volvo
Volvo.description: Swedish manufacturer pioneering automotive safety. Scandinavian design, comprehensive safety systems, and comfortable luxury create family-focused premium vehicles.

Zenvo.name: Zenvo
Zenvo.description: Danish hypercar manufacturer creating ultra-exclusive vehicles. Extreme power, bespoke craftsmanship, and limited production define Nordic approach to automotive extremes.
